ACHRelationship.description: ACHRelationship represents a bank account connection for ACH transfers.

accountId.description: Account ID (UUID).

status.description: ACHRelationshipStatus represents the status of an ACH relationship.

BrokerAccount.description: BrokerAccount represents a broker-managed trading account.

status.description: BrokerAccountStatus represents the status of a broker account.

BrokerAccountTradingConfigurations.description: BrokerAccountTradingConfigurations represents trading configurations for a broker account.

dtbpCheck.description: Day trading buying power check setting.

BrokerOrder.description: BrokerOrder represents a trading order for a broker account.

orderClass.description: BrokerOrderClass represents the class of order.

replacedBy.description: Order ID that replaced this order.

replaces.description: Order ID that this order replaces.

side.description: BrokerOrderSide represents the side of an order.

status.description: BrokerOrderStatus represents the status of an order.

timeInForce.description: BrokerTimeInForce represents the time in force.

type.description: BrokerOrderType represents the type of order.

BrokerPosition.description: BrokerPosition represents a position in a broker account.

side.description: BrokerPositionSide represents the side of a position.

BrokerStopLossSpec.description: BrokerStopLossSpec specifies stop loss parameters for bracket orders.

BrokerTakeProfitSpec.description: BrokerTakeProfitSpec specifies take profit parameters for bracket orders.

CancelTradingOrderRequest.description: CancelTradingOrderRequest is the request to cancel a trading order for a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

orderId.description: The order ID (bound from path variable).

CancelTradingOrderResponse.description: CancelTradingOrderResponse is the response after canceling a trading order.

orderId.description: The order ID that was canceled.

CancelTransferRequest.description: CancelTransferRequest is the request to cancel a transfer.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

transferId.description: The transfer ID (bound from path variable).

CancelTransferResponse.description: CancelTransferResponse is the response after canceling a transfer.

CloseAllTradingPositionsRequest.description: CloseAllTradingPositionsRequest is the request to close all positions for a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

cancelOrders.description: Whether to cancel all open orders first.

CloseAllTradingPositionsResponse.description: CloseAllTradingPositionsResponse is the response after closing all positions.

CloseBrokerAccountRequest.description: CloseBrokerAccountRequest is the request to close a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

CloseBrokerAccountResponse.description: CloseBrokerAccountResponse is the response after closing a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID that was closed.

success.description: Whether the close request was accepted.

CloseTradingPositionRequest.description: CloseTradingPositionRequest is the request to close a position for a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

ClosedTradingPosition.description: ClosedTradingPosition represents the result of closing a position.

CreateACHRelationshipRequest.description: CreateACHRelationshipRequest is the request to create an ACH relationship.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

processorToken.description: Plaid processor token (alternative to bank account details).

CreateAccountRequest.description: CreateAccountRequest is the request to create a new broker account.

enabledAssetsMargin.description: Whether to enable margin for assets.

CreateTradingOrderRequest.description: CreateTradingOrderRequest is the request to create a trading order for a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

notional.description: Notional value to trade (required if qty not specified).

orderClass.description: BrokerOrderClass represents the class of order.

qty.description: Quantity to trade (required if notional not specified).

side.description: BrokerOrderSide represents the side of an order.

symbol.description: Symbol or asset ID to trade.

timeInForce.description: BrokerTimeInForce represents the time in force.

type.description: BrokerOrderType represents the type of order.

CreateTransferRequest.description: CreateTransferRequest is the request to create a transfer.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

relationshipId.description: ACH relationship ID (required for ACH transfers).

DeleteACHRelationshipRequest.description: DeleteACHRelationshipRequest is the request to delete an ACH relationship.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

achRelationshipId.description: The ACH relationship ID (bound from path variable).

DeleteACHRelationshipResponse.description: DeleteACHRelationshipResponse is the response after deleting an ACH relationship.

immediateFamilyExposed.description: Whether the user has an immediate family member that is politically exposed.

isAffiliatedExchangeOrFinra.description: Whether the user is affiliated with an exchange or FINRA.

isControlPerson.description: Whether the user is a control person.

isPoliticallyExposed.description: Whether the user is a politically exposed person.

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

GetBrokerAccountRequest.description: GetBrokerAccountRequest is the request to get a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

GetTradingOrderRequest.description: GetTradingOrderRequest is the request to get a trading order for a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

nested.description: Whether to include nested leg orders.

orderId.description: The order ID (bound from path variable).

GetTradingPositionRequest.description: GetTradingPositionRequest is the request to get a position for a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

GetTransferRequest.description: GetTransferRequest is the request to get a transfer.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

transferId.description: The transfer ID (bound from path variable).

dateOfDepartureFromHomeCountry.description: Date of departure from home country (YYYY-MM-DD).

items.description: FundingSource represents the source of funding.

taxIdType.description: TaxIdType represents the type of tax ID.

ListACHRelationshipsRequest.description: ListACHRelationshipsRequest is the request to list ACH relationships.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

ListACHRelationshipsResponse.description: ListACHRelationshipsResponse is the response containing ACH relationships.

ListAccountsRequest.description: ListAccountsRequest is the request to list broker accounts.

createdAfter.description: Filter by creation date after (RFC 3339 or YYYY-MM-DD).

createdBefore.description: Filter by creation date before (RFC 3339 or YYYY-MM-DD).

entities.description: Comma-separated list of entities to include (contact, identity, etc.).

query.description: Filter by query string (searches across fields).

ListAccountsResponse.description: ListAccountsResponse is the response containing a list of broker accounts.

ListTradingOrdersRequest.description: ListTradingOrdersRequest is the request to list orders for a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

limit.description: Maximum number of orders to return.

nested.description: Whether to include nested leg orders.

until.description: Filter by orders updated until this timestamp.

ListTradingOrdersResponse.description: ListTradingOrdersResponse is the response containing trading orders.

ListTradingPositionsRequest.description: ListTradingPositionsRequest is the request to list positions for a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

ListTradingPositionsResponse.description: ListTradingPositionsResponse is the response containing trading positions.

ListTransfersRequest.description: ListTransfersRequest is the request to list transfers.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

ListTransfersResponse.description: ListTransfersResponse is the response containing transfers.

accountId.description: Account ID (UUID).

direction.description: TransferDirection represents the direction of a transfer.

status.description: TransferStatus represents the status of a transfer.

type.description: TransferType represents the type of transfer.

UpdateBrokerAccountRequest.description: UpdateBrokerAccountRequest is the request to update a broker account.

accountId.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

get.description:
ListAccounts retrieves a list of broker accounts.
 GET /v1/accounts

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: Filter by query string (searches across fields).
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Filter by creation date after (RFC 3339 or YYYY-MM-DD).
parameters.name: created_after

parameters.description: Filter by creation date before (RFC 3339 or YYYY-MM-DD).
parameters.name: created_before

parameters.description: Filter by account status.
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Sort order (asc, desc).
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of entities to include (contact, identity, etc.).
parameters.name: entities

post.description:
CreateAccount creates a new broker-managed account.
 POST /v1/accounts

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

delete.description:
CloseAccount closes a broker account.
 DELETE /v1/accounts/{account_id}

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

get.description:
GetAccount retrieves a specific broker account.
 GET /v1/accounts/{account_id}

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

patch.description:
UpdateAccount updates a broker account.
 PATCH /v1/accounts/{account_id}

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

get.description:
ListACHRelationships retrieves ACH relationships for an account.
 GET /v1/accounts/{account_id}/ach_relationships

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: Filter by statuses (comma-separated).
parameters.name: statuses

post.description:
CreateACHRelationship creates an ACH relationship for an account.
 POST /v1/accounts/{account_id}/ach_relationships

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

delete.description:
DeleteACHRelationship deletes an ACH relationship.
 DELETE /v1/accounts/{account_id}/ach_relationships/{ach_relationship_id}

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: The ACH relationship ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: ach_relationship_id

get.description:
ListTransfers retrieves transfers for an account.
 GET /v1/accounts/{account_id}/transfers

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: Filter by direction (INCOMING, OUTGOING).
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: Filter by limit.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Filter by offset.
parameters.name: offset

post.description:
CreateTransfer creates a fund transfer for an account.
 POST /v1/accounts/{account_id}/transfers

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

delete.description:
CancelTransfer cancels a pending transfer.
 DELETE /v1/accounts/{account_id}/transfers/{transfer_id}

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: The transfer ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: transfer_id

get.description:
GetTransfer retrieves a specific transfer.
 GET /v1/accounts/{account_id}/transfers/{transfer_id}

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: The transfer ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: transfer_id

get.description:
ListTradingOrders retrieves orders for an account.
 GET /v1/trading/accounts/{account_id}/orders

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: Filter by status (open, closed, all).
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Maximum number of orders to return.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Filter by orders updated until this timestamp.
parameters.name: until

parameters.description: Sort direction (asc, desc).
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: Whether to include nested leg orders.
parameters.name: nested

parameters.description: Filter by symbols (comma-separated).
parameters.name: symbols

post.description:
CreateTradingOrder creates a trading order for an account.
 POST /v1/trading/accounts/{account_id}/orders

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: The order ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: order_id

get.description:
GetTradingOrder retrieves a specific order.
 GET /v1/trading/accounts/{account_id}/orders/{order_id}

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: The order ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: order_id

parameters.description: Whether to include nested leg orders.
parameters.name: nested

delete.description:
CloseAllTradingPositions closes all positions for an account.
 DELETE /v1/trading/accounts/{account_id}/positions

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: Whether to cancel all open orders first.
parameters.name: cancel_orders

get.description:
ListTradingPositions retrieves positions for an account.
 GET /v1/trading/accounts/{account_id}/positions

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

delete.description:
CloseTradingPosition closes a specific position.
 DELETE /v1/trading/accounts/{account_id}/positions/{symbol}

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: The symbol (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: symbol

parameters.description: Quantity to close (optional).
parameters.name: qty

parameters.description: Percentage to close (optional).
parameters.name: percentage

get.description:
GetTradingPosition retrieves a specific position.
 GET /v1/trading/accounts/{account_id}/positions/{symbol}

parameters.description: HTTP Basic Auth with base64 encoded API_KEY:API_SECRET
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The account ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: The symbol (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: symbol
